widgets.notes: The time it takes to service a request with a HTTP code 200.
widgets.nrql: SELECT percentile(totalTime, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction WHERE  httpResponseCode = '200' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Latency - HTTP 200

widgets.notes: The time it takes to service a request with a HTTP code 500.
widgets.nrql: SELECT percentile(totalTime, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction WHERE  httpResponseCode = '500' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Latency - HTTP 500

widgets.notes: The time it takes to service a request segmented by a custom attribute.
widgets.nrql: SELECT percentile(totalTime, 90) FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago FACET username limit 20
widgets.title: Latency - 90 Percentile with Username

widgets.notes: The time it takes to service a request with a HTTP code 500.
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE  httpResponseCode = '500' SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour COMPARE WITH 1 day ago EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Latency - HTTP 500 - Trend Analysis

widgets.notes: A measure of how much demand is being placed on your application.
widgets.nrql: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) AS 'Requests per Minute' FROM Transaction  since 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Traffic - Throughput Per Minute

widgets.notes: A measure of how much demand is being placed on your application.
widgets.nrql: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction  since 7 day ago TIMESERIES 1 hour  EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Traffic - Throughput Per Hour

widgets.notes: A measure of how much demand is being placed on your application with a custom attribute.
widgets.nrql: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction  since 1 day ago FACET username limit 20
widgets.title: Traffic - Throughput Per Hour with Username

widgets.notes: A measure of how much demand is being placed on your application.
widgets.nrql: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 hour) AS 'Requests per Hour' FROM Transaction  since 7 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 week ago TIMESERIES 1 hour EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Traffic - Throughput Per Hour - Trend Analysis

widgets.nrql: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '1%') as '1xx Informational', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '2%') as '2xx Success', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%') as '3xx Redirection', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%') as '4xx Client Error', filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%') as '5xx Server Error' FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Errors - HTTP Status Codes

widgets.nrql: SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true) AS 'Unhandled Error rate %' FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago
widgets.title: Errors - Unhandled Errors %

widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE  httpResponseCode LIKE '3%' or httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' OR httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 day ago FACET httpResponseCode, name TIMESERIES 10 minutes
widgets.title: Errors - HTTP Code Redirection, Client Error And Server Error by Transaction Name

widgets.notes: The rate of requests that fail, either explicitly or implicitly
widgets.nrql: SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%' as 'Redirection'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' as 'Client Error'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' as 'Server Error') FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minutes EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Errors - HTTP Code Redirection, Client Error And Server Error

widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError WHERE  username IS NOT NULL FACET username, error.message, transactionName, host SINCE 1 day ago limit 10
widgets.title: Errors - Top 10 Unhandled Application Errors with Transaction Name and Host

widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError  FACET error.class SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute limit 5 EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Errors - Top 5 Unhandled Application Errors

widgets.nrql: SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 50, 90, 99) FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Saturation - Database Percentile

widgets.nrql: SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 90) FROM Transaction  FACET host, name TIMESERIES 1 hour since  1 day ago
widgets.title: Saturation - Top 5 Database 90 Percentile by Host and Transaction Name

widgets.nrql: SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 90) FROM Transaction  FACET username SINCE 1 day ago LIMIT 10
widgets.title: Saturation - Database 90 Percentile with Username

widgets.nrql: SELECT percentile(databaseDuration, 50, 95) FROM Transaction  SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE
widgets.title: Saturation - Database Trend Analysis

widgets.nrql: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) as 'RPM', max(totalTime) as 'Total', max(webDuration) as 'Web', max(databaseDuration) as 'DB', max(externalDuration) as 'External' FROM Transaction FACET host SINCE 1 day ago
widgets.title: Saturation - Throughput Per Min, Max Total, Max Web, Max DB and Max Ext by Host
